t:
As my blood formed a pool near his legs, my assailant started cleaning his knife on my shirt.


Although, he realized his mistake once the blood started climbing up his legs.
c:
As he stood there in fear, I forced my hand down his throat...



#blood #assailant #murder #revenge #unexpected #possess
